Posts.Content: bxxbella143 wrote: so about 3 yrs ago i found this lump in my rigth breast. had a biopsy and mamo and they said it was nothing, think the exact thing was fibrosis something. they told me to always check and keep an i eye on it. they said it could be from the birth control pills. but honestly i have not been back to the gyno since then. the lump has grown again and i am very nervous. i have no insurance at the moment and not sure what to do. can someone give me some advice? also it does hurt every now and then, especially when i am going to get my period. btw i am 22. thanks Jules Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: have a lump bxxbella143 KristinaK
